Hotel Modern at the east end of the central plaza is a budget choice, with double rooms from 100 pesos. The hotel has somewhat seen better days, but it posesess a charismatic central atrium filled with plants and sunlight. An easy and central choice because it is located in the centre of town.

"Hotel California" is another good option to stay when visiting this city. It is 10 minutes away (walking distance) from Uruapan's main attraction "El Parque Nacional" you can view their economical rates on their site hotelcaliforniaupn.com, it is a safe and family friendly hotel.
